tasks.task: Planting onion sets in a no-dig bed and hugelkultur bed
subtasks: Introducing the channel and topic of onion growing
Checking the planting date (5th of October) as ideal for planting onion sets
Selecting onion varieties (Shakespeare and Sensue yellow)
Ensuring proper planting depth (5cm) for onion sets
Maintaining appropriate spacing (10cm apart and 20cm between rows)
Planting in the no-dig bed method
Explaining the no-dig bed technique (no digging involved, layering organic materials)
Building the no-dig bed by adding compost, mulch, and organic materials
Explaining the hugelkultur technique (mound culture using decaying wood and organic matter)
Preparing the hugelkultur bed with decaying wood, branches, and organic matter
Watering considerations due to wet ground
Anticipating growth and planning for future updates

tasks.task: Experimenting with no-dig bed and hugelkultur methods for onion growth
subtasks: Measuring the success of each method by comparing onion growth results
Wait for the growth period to conclude and assess the performance of both beds

tasks.task: Distributing content and engaging with the audience
subtasks: Encouraging subscribers and comments on the video
Promising to share updates on onion growth and future videos
Signing off and bidding farewell to the viewers
